thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zoneco Group Expects To Swing To Net Loss In 2017, Share Trade To Halt Pending Announcement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zoneco Group Expects To Swing To Net Loss In 2017, Share Trade To Halt Pending Announcement
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Zoneco Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT EXPECTS TO SWING TO NET LOSS OF 530-720 MILLION YUAN ($83.89-113.97 million)IN 2017 VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 79.6 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS SHARES TRADE TO HALT FROM JAN 31 PENDING ANNOUNCEMENT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FtGZza ; bit.ly/2FtBe4C Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3176 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
